document_data.name: Jerrod
document_data.mainbody: '''Jerrod''' was a [[barbarian]] [[shaman]] who fought against the [[archmage]] [[Arakon]] and united the [[Reghedmen]] and the [[Uthgardt]] tribes against the common foe.
document_data.Possessions: Jerrod wielded an [[enchanted]] [[mace]], in later centuries simply known as ''[[Jerrod's mace]]''.
document_data.History:
[[File:y_a6cabae2.jpg|thumb|right|250px|''Jerrod sealing the gate to [[Baator]].'']]
Some time before the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]], [[wizard]] Arakon attacked [[Icewind Dale]] with a army of mercenaries. Banding together the Reghedmen and the Uthgardt tribes fought back until the archmage opened a gate to the [[Nine Hells]].

After seeing a vision of [[Tempos]], Jerrod sacrificed himself by leaping into the portal to [[Baator]], sealing the passageway and creating monument that came to be known as ''[[Jerrod's stone]]''.
